full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Intrusion Alarm System and Monitoring Services Contract
### Solicitation Number: SPMD-23-WIAS/A
### Publication Date: November 24, 2023

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites bids for the supply and installation of a single Intrusion Detection and Alarm System, as specified in the solicitation documents. The provision of spare parts, technical support, and alarm monitoring services as also part of this requirement.

**Location of Delivery**: Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, Canada

**Solicitation Schedule**

* This solicitation will be conducted in two phases.
* **Phase I:** Respondents will submit their Technical Bids.
* **Phase II:** Shortlisted respondents will be invited to submit their Financial Bids.

**Evaluation Criteria**: Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Key Details:**

* **Closing Date:** December 4, 2023, at 2:30 PM (AST)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Daphne Klassen-Hayes
	+ Email: [daphne.klassen-hayes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.klassen-hayes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (613) 296-0230
	+ Location: 140 O'Connor Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R5, Canada
* **Notice URL:** None
* **Attachments:** Various documents, available upon request. (For English: refer to [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25767/spmd-23-wias_a_rfp_final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25767/spmd-23-wias_a_rfp_final.pdf).)

### Additional Information
The Canadian Government's Buy and Sell webpage ([https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca)) contains the solicitation documents and additional information regarding this procurement. Please refer to the website for updated status and notice regarding this requirement.

All qualified bidders are invited to submit their proposals by the closing date. Proposers are advised to review the solicitation carefully and submit any questions or concerns to the contact person.
